scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.start: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" && open http://localhost:5173
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:backend && npm run typecheck:frontend
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test && npm run build
